title: Cheating Suspisions, Cougar Buying Signals, Grilling Tips, Best in Sport and more.
itunes:title: Cheating Suspisions, Cougar Buying Signals, Grilling Tips, Best in Sport and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  What comes with the test?  We have situations that make you say, "What The F!"  The Chief Love Officer has words for a husband that lacks condomnsense.  Uncle Steve and Nephew Tommy share with us the proper way to grill.  Money and work go together like butt cheeks and there is a right way to ask for more cheddar.  Ever say, "This is the first time that this has happened and I apologize."  Even older ladies have a sales pitch.  The crew talk about cheating and suspects.  What sport would you want to be the best in?  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us about the effectiveness of pray and what it means to him.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
